div.p:
Item die secunda aprilis infrascripti post merediem in curia ballivorum affirmata quod
Johannes Donaldi rure manens convictus est per assisam de perturbacione iniusta Johannis
fabri hanc villam commorantis pro qua adiudicatur in amerciamento curie Et eodem modo dictus
Johannes faber in amerciamento pro perturbacione prefati Johannis Donaldi et emendabit alter alteri et cetera

Die lune quinto die aprilis anno et cetera lxxiijo gilbertus de camera adiudicatur in amerciamento curie per
confessionem propriam pro iniusta fractione communis ordinacionis iactando siue fodendo falas super ripam

Item eodem die Henricus famulus Johannis litsar de li greyn per assisam convictus de
amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Johannis og / Et eodem modo Johannes og in amerciamento pro perturbacione
iniusta et dispersione dicti Johannis litstar et emendabit eadem ad visum proborum

Thomas campsy auri faber adiudicatur in amerciamento nomine et ex parte vxoris pro iniusta
detencione duarum camisiarum et vnius libre lini thome blinzel et restaurabit
huiusmodi bona prefato thome et cetera

Johannes scherar nomine vxoris sue et ipsius calumpniavit Jonetam ryny per plegium pro
detencione iniusta diuersarum rerum ab eisdem ad bonum compotum vnde dicta Joneta
aduisata cum suo prelocutore Johanne ramsay peciit diem legalem respondendum prefato pleges
qui sibi conceditur per curiam hodie ad octo dies plegio pro ipsius introitu dicto Johanne ramsay
obligando se subiciend' Juri pro huiusmodi plegiagione tanquam vicinus infra hanc villam

Die veneris nono die aprilis anno et cetera lxxiij Actio mota inter Willelmum Rettre ex vna et
Dauid crukeschank ex parte altra continuata in hunc diem per assisam desuper electam
Adhuc continuatur per quosdam de dicta assisa vsque ad diem Juridicum huius burgi post
pascha proximo futuro et hoc propter absenciam quorundam de assisa ab antea electa et ad
detencionem eiusdem Juratam vnde dictus Willelmus rettre protestatus fuit quod Respectuacio cause predicte
non sibi preiudicaret seu in dampnum quoquo modo deueniret in futuris penes eandem

Eodem die actio pendens inter Dauid mathoson ex vna penes prosecucionem et deliberacionem Willelmi
filii quondam Johannis mathoson et Ricardum cullan ad tutoriam dicti pueri allegantem veluti
patet ex actionibus precedentibus que quidem causa continuata fuit ad presentem diem Et similiter de
nouo continuatur et respectuatur ad curiam huius ville capitalem prescriptam propter personalem presenciam
et colloquium cum domino Johanne de Janna super disposicionem et deliberacionem materie antedicte

Johannes liddale commorans in fotino in amerciamento per confessionem propriam pro iniusta percussione Agnes'
filie Johannis Et eodem modo dicta Agnes in amerciamento pro perturbacione eiusdem Johannis in verbo

accedensThis appears to be the second part of an entry that is normally dealt with in a head court, in this case most likely that on the Monday after Quasimodo in 1473, which was 26 April. nichil reperit distringibile ad dictum anuum redditum recuperandum preter terram et lapides
quos presentauit in curia coram ballivis pro tercio die processus Testibus Willelmo edindeoch
thoma geld burgensibus dicti burgi et Duncano straloch bedello

Item eodem die patricius Willelmi filius et heres quondam Willelmi ade burgensis huius ville veniens
ad barram cum suo prelocutore Angusio Johannis protestatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu xv s'
dicto patricio tanquam heredi eiusdem quondam patris sui annuatim debit' et a longo tempore
non solut' de vna terra Jacente in ly scule hill inter terram Jacobi crag ex parte orientali
et terram Andree scherar' ex occidentali parte Ad quam terram personaliter accedens nichil
reperit distringibile ad dictum annualem redditum recuperandum nisi terram et lapides quos presentavit
in curia coram ballivis tanquam secundo die processus Testibus patricio smyth patricio cowpar burgensibus huius
burgi et Duncano straloch vno sergeandorum

The same day the actione dependand betuix Dauid mathoson on the ta part and Richard of
culan anent the deliuerence and disposicione of William mathoson second son' to quhilum
Johne mathison burges of this ton' quhilk was continevit to this present court / the
aldirman and consel avisit has Resplatit the same caus' to stande in the same force and
effect as it is this day vnto this day xv dais for gude caus' and specialie for
the cuming of my lord of aberdene gif he cumis within the said xv dais And failye
and tharof tobe endit that day be the said aldirman and consel as salbe sene expedient
to thame / and gif he cumis erar . tobe endit within twa dais eftir his cuming

Item eodem die actio mota inter Ricardum Kyntor et Johannem marr iuniorem penes iniustam ablacionem
certorum piscium salmonum vnius sexte partis piscarie de Croois ut asseretur per dictum Johannem ablata
et continuata in presentem diem prepositus et communi consilium de nouo posuerunt decisionem et determinacionem
eiusdem cause in Respectum vsque ad diem veneris proximo venturo modo et forma quibus
nunc absque preiudicio alicuius partis

Patricius androson eodem die coram balliuis protribunali sedentibus confessus est se debere Ricardo Kintor
filio Jacobi Kyntor vnum dimedium auri valoris xij s' et ad satisfaciendum eidem Ricardo
de dicto dimedio valoris xij s' pro valore eiusdem infra hinc et festum penthecostes proximo
venturo fideliter promisit et obligauit et cetera

Item eodem die infra scripto veniens ad barram Johannes gregorij burgensis huius burgi protes
tatus fuit pro quodam annuo redditu sex solidorum annuatim debit' dicto Johanni et a longo tempore
non solut' de vna terra Jacente in vico viridi inter terram Johannis litstar versus oriens et
communem viam regiam versus austrum Ad quam quidem terram personaliter accedens nichil reperit
distringibile ad dictum annuum redditum recuperandum super dictam terram nisi terram et lapi
des quos presentavit in curia coram ballivis pro primo die huius processus Testibus Johanne Wat
son de gowil Johanne torryleith burgensibus dicti burgi et Duncano straloch bedello

Actio pendens inter Willelmum rettre ex vna parte et Dauid crukeschank continetur forma
et effectu quibus nunc per quosdam desuper elect' et Jurat' vsque ad diem veneris
proximo venturo ob non personalem presenciam integre assise / et tunc habebit finalem detencionem
et deliberacionem sine vlteriori processus quamuis deficiat de quibusdam personis
non comparentibus / ad huiusmodi inantea per partes electos

Curia ballivorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio quarto die mensis Maij anno
Domini et cetera lxxiijo

quo die curia affirmata Dauid spens posuit se in voluntate ballivo
rum de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione et percussione Jonete Dys' ad sanguinis effusionem
sub noctis silencio et emendabit dampnum iuxta ordinacionem proborum Item Joneta
Dys' in amerciamento pro iniusta perturbacione dicti Dauid' in verbo tantum veluti delictum
est per assisam

The fift day of Maij the yer' et cetera lxxiij Before the aldirman and balliez sittand
in Jugement and vthiris diuers' of the consel Johne of mar offerit him to
vndirly the law and til hafe ane knaulage of his nychtbouris of all actione
clame or caus' that Richard of Kintor Dauid Kyntor and thar' complicis has
to say til him . anent ony wrangwis' metting or taking of quhatsumevir gudis takkis or fischingis of quhilum g Kintor quhilkis persons has gerd him be summond be our' souerane
lordis lettres tocomper at Edinburgh before our' soueran lord and his consel eftir
thetenour of thame And nochtwithstanding all summons' he has offerit him
and offeris him yete as of before til abyde and vndirly the ordinance de
terminacione and knaulage of the saidis his nychbouris before the aldirman
and baillies as his Jugis ordinar' / Apon the quhilk peroffer the said Johne
has askit with instance ane testimoniale vndir the seil of Johne the vaus ane
of the baillies present in the tyme

Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio eiusdem per balliuos sexto die Maij
anno et cetera lxxiijo

head.add: nota Ri Kintor et matheus coupar

div.p:
quo die curia affirmata Ricardus Kyntor filius Jacobi et Matheus cowpar
accusati per prepositum et ballivos de iniusta perturbacione Johannis vaus et Roberti blindsel ijrum
ballivorum huius burgi negauerunt dictam calumpniam submittendo eosdem determinacionem assise
que quidem Assisa mature aduisata deliberauit dictos Ricardum et matheum per eandem
convictos de perturbacione dictorum balliuorum in verbo negocia et seruicia ville
excercencium et ideo ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabunt offensam iuxta
ordinacionem prepositi et consilii

Item iidem Ricardus et matheus adiudicatur et ipsorum quilibet adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro
iniusta perturbacione philippi Dunbrek sergeandi veluti Inuentum fuit per assisam
simili modo vt prescribitur

Eodem die Johannes Dunde convictus per assisam de perturbacione iniusta et percussione
Johannis tailyour' adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit eidem ad visum proborum
In curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem vijo die maij anno prescipto

quo die curia
affirmata patricius smyth convictus de perturbacione Ricardi Kintor filij Jacobi in verbis multum
iniuriosis adiudicatur in amerciamento

The same day the aldirman Alexander of chavmer androu alanson Johne of Knollis alexander blindsel and
Dauid colison ar chosin with consent of partijs til ende and decide the Richt anent the Assedacione
of a sext part of the Croois clamit be Richard of Kintor on the ta part and Johne of mar' on the
tothir part / quhilkis persons salmak gude faith til ende and see gif the said' Richard quhilk of the forsaidis personis has
richt tooccupy and brouke the assidacione of thesext part forsaid And thai baith ar
oblist be the fathis of thar bodijs tostande to thar' decrete and determinacione heratour
patrik badenagh thomas prat thom malisson and Dauid mathoson ar chosin togiddre with the
forsaidis personis toende the caus' before writin

patricius androson burgensis de abirdene constituit Johannem marr iuniorem suum procuratorem ad prosequendum et
defendendum pro ipso constituen' in omnibus actionibus causis et querelis motis seu monendis ipsum
patricium tangen' seu tangere valentibus quomodolibet Et specialiter ad prosequendum Jacobum de
Kintor burgensem dicti burgi coram ballivis ad eidem constituti seu dicto suo procuratori satisfaciend' et
soluend' xvij s' et x d' eidem ut asserit debit' secundum quod coram dictis ballivis seu Judicibus
ostendi vel probare poterit dan' dicto suo procuratori plenam potestatem super premiss' cum vniuersis clausulis
tali procuratore necessariis et oportunis Promittens de Rato et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos decimo die
mensis maij anno Domini et cetera lxxiijo quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent
in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die patricius stiklau legitime vocatus ad prosequendum plegium per eundem porrectum
contra Nicholaum baxtar in manibus Duncani straloch vnius sergeandorum huius burgi
comparuit / et predictum Nicholaum ad ipsius calumpniam vocari fecit / quo quidem Nicholao
legitime vocato tanquam primo die processus et non comparen' adiudicatur pro amerciamento curie
namarunt Et de nouo premuniri ad proximam curiam legalem et cetera

Alexander fynlau adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta detencione vnius le wethir et
cuiusdam ouis iuvenilis a Johanne lammynton et tenetur restituere dicta animalia eidem et cetera

Johannes mar' procurator patricij androson et eo nomine calumpniavit Jacobum de Kyntor
pro iniusta detencione xviij s' demptis iij d' a dicto patricio vnde dictus Jacobus
pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum dicte calumpnie qui sibi conceditur per curiam ad quin
denam futuram videlicet proximam curiam legalem

Johannes stokar in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione iniusta Johannis de Dunde et
eodem modo dictus Johannes Dunde in amerciamento pro perturbaicone Johannis stokar
que quidem perturbacio vtriusque fuit in verbo tantum veluti deliberatus fuit
per assisam

Item eodem die Robertus quhitson pro primo die vocatus ad sectam Dauidis mathei
responsurus cuidam plegio contra eundem porrecto per dictum Dauid pro iniusta detencione
decem solidorum ab eodem Non comparuit / quare precipitur sergeando quod capiat
districtum ab eodem ad valorem viii s' et quod premuniat eundem ad proximam
curiam legalem tanquam secundum diem processus

Johannes lammynton adiudicatur in amerciamento pro iniusta porrectione plegij contra quendam Robertum
famulum alexandri fynlai

Item eodem die Dauid Duncan / gracia prepositi et quorundam communis consilij Receptus fuit in
liberum burgensem et fratrem gilde huius burgi prestito solito Juramento

Vndecimo die maii anno Domini et cetera lxxiiio quo die Matheus cowpar posuit se in voluntate ballivorum de
amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Ade hervy per confessionem propriam / et in alio amerciamento adiudicatur pro
perturbacione andree luss' in verbo veluti compertum fuit per assisam emendabit partibus et cetera
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio per balliuos xiijo die maij anno prescripto

quo die
curia affirmata Cristiana famula Johannis scherar adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro perturbacione
iniusta Elizabeth st lesly Et eodemmodo dicta Elizabeth in amerciamento pro perturbacione dicte Cristiane
et emendabit quelibet alter de dampno sufficienter

Decimoquarto die maij anno prescripto coram preposito ballivis et consilio huius burgi patricius badenach
prelucotor Thome Androson pecijt nomine dicti thome ab alexandro fresal tunc presente deliberacionem
et restauracionem certorum bonorum cartarum et summarum argenti ex parte Ibbote Wode filij quondam
thome Wod veluti continetur in quadam cedula lecta et presentata dictis preposito ballivis et consilio et cetera
Post cuius quidem cedule lecturam prefatus alexander cum eadem aduisatus pecijt diem legalem ad respondendum
et copiam huiusmodi scripti vna cum quadam littera testimoniali sibi sumptibus suis discerni quo sibi conceditur
et ad respondendum die Jouis proximo futuro Et incontinen' predictus thomas androson constituit patricium badenach
et Johannem Wod coniunctim et divisim suos procuratores in materia antedicta ad agendum prosequendum et defendendum
pro ipso constituenti ex parte dicte Ibbote secundum quod Jura volunt et eisdem procuratoribus aut eorum alter melius videba
expedire cum vniuersi clausulis procuratorio tali requisitis promitten' Ratum et gratum et cetera

In curia balliuorum Burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem xixo die maij anno prescripto quo die curia
affirmata Edrianus nauta convictus per Assisam de iniusta perturbacione Donaldi scissoris
adiudicatur in amerciamento curie et emendabit parti de dampno

The xxj day of maij the yer' et cetera lxxiij It was proponit be the Aldirman to the
consel and hail communitee of this toune in the tolbuthe for the Assedacione of the
Watteris and landis . gif it was plesand and likand to thame tilhaf the said
watiris and landis set for the escheving of Requestis of lordis / and for the common
proffite of thetoune / quhilkis consel and communitee Inquirit seueraly ilk man be him
self be the offisar' sayde that it had beyn spedfull and proffitable for the common'
proffit of this toune that the watteris had beyn set before ony Request had
cumin / And has with ane assent and consent gravntit to the setting of baith
wateris and landis / And has chargit the aldirman that he chese sik net' as
him thinke spedefull and proffitable for the setting of thaim for the common proffite
of this toune And that tobe doone in all possible and gudely haist but delay
quhat tyme that ples' him et cetera

The same day It was ordanit be the Aldirman and consel that the thre clerkis that war'
in the service of the qwer' this present yer' salbe continevit in thar' said service for
this yer' tocum for sik like fee as thai has of before makand siklike service
as thai did before tyme and erar' bettir at thare power to the quhilk
thai ar' oblist be thar' handis / quhilk forsaid continuacione salbe fra Witsun
day that next cumis quhil the Witsunday a yer' thareftir

Curia Legalis balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem xxiiijo die maij anno et cetera lxxiijo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Robertus quhitson secundo die vocatus ad sectam Dauidis mathei veluti
continetur in primo processu Non comparuit / quare precipitur sergeando et cetera Et quod premuniat eundem ad
proximam diem legalem tanquam ad tercium diem huius processus

Item eodem die Alexander colison pro primo die legitime vocatus ad sectam Patricij tailyour'
responsurus eidem super x s' et cetera Non comparuit quare precipitur bedello et cetera Et quod premuniat
eundem ad quindenam sive proximam curiam legalem tanquam ad secundum diem processus

Johannes lammyntone adiudicatur in amerciamento curie pro iniusta porrectione plegij contra
alexandrum finlaij veluti compertum fuit per assisam

Alexander fynlaij eodemmodo adiudicatur in amerciamento pro per porrectione iniusta plegij super
dictum Johannem lammynton

Andreas Keith convictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione gilberti de camera
Et dictus gilbertus pro perturbacione ipsius andree adiudicatur ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento

Item quidam Duncanus simili modo conuictus per assisam iuratam pro perturbacione et percus
sione cuiusdam mulieris appellate megota

Item eodem die alexander trail deuenit plegius legalis pro alexandro fynlai quod Johannes lammynton
erit idempnis de ipso aliter quam per viam Juris Et eodemmodo dictus Johannes dedit
alexandrum stil plegium de indempnitate prefati alexander ut supra Et quod comparebunt ambe
partes predicte coram preposito et consilio responsurus pro scandalo ut asseretur imponit' assise per
easdem et hoc die veneris proximo venturo
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem xxvo die maij anno et cetera lxxiijo

quo die
Andreas lammynton convictus per assisam de iniusta perturbacione Johannis skynnar adiudicatur
amerciamento curie et emendabit parti lese de dampno sufficienter

The xxix day of Maij the yere before writin Johne litstar comperand before the aldirman and consel
in the tolbuthe / be his forspekar Adam of craufurd chalansit gilbert morison of xij
barellis of ass' quhilkis war merkit with the said John merk as he said quhilk gilbert
forsaid allegit and sayde that the said xij barellis of ass' ar his awne propre gude
bocht fra the man the man that aucht thame and chargit him to ressave thaim
and chese thame on his behalf And that the said wrangwisly merkit thame / quhilk
the said gilbert has takyn toprufe suffisantly betuix this day and xv dais
next tocum ony tyme the party being warnit thartoo And in themene tyme Johne
the Vaus ane of the baillies is ordand tokepe the said ass'

Item the same day maistir William vmfray on theta part and Robert prat on the tothir
part ar summittit to vndirly the decrete and deliuerence of thir personis vndirwritin
anent the debate of thar' Richtis of the tail of Robert prattis land vndir the
hil fra the hil to the ga the barne to the gate and thir ar' the persons Androw
scherar aldirman Johne of mar' Androw alanson Richard of Kintor Johne of Knollis
mathou fichet Alexander meignes Robert of culan alexander blindsel and Dauid symson
quhilkis personis sal sit and common tharapon on Wednisday that next cumis and decide
the same eftir as thai thinke expedient
Curia balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta in pretorio nono die Junij anno et cetera lxxiijo

quo die
Andreas cummyn scissor per assisam convictus de perturbacione iniusta Angusij thome
adiudicatur in amerciamento curie Et eodemmodo dictus Angusius in amerciamento pro perturbacione prefati Willelmi
et emendabunt se adinuicem de dampno secundum visum proborum et cetera

The nynt day of Junij the yer' et cetera lxxiii At theinstance and Request of a mychtie and noble
lord George Erl of huntlee lord gordon and of badenagh the Aldirman and consel
of this burgh has gravntit and promittit that at the next Assedacione and setting of
watteris of this toune thai sal set and to mail lat til Alexander the hay bur
ges of this burgh ane sext part of the Croois for siklike termys as
vthiris nychbouris has the Remainnand of thesaid water he payand tharfor
in all thing sik like price as vthiris his nychbouris doois Indurand the termez
of the Assedacione made to thame tharupon'

Eodem die Alexander Arthur receptus fuit in liberum burgensem tantum
ad instanciam et requestum Ricardi Kyntor prestito solito Juramento et cetera

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta ibidem xiiijo die Junij anno et cetera lxxiijo
quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Matheus cowpar calumpniauit Dauid Kyntor de l s' et vltra ad bonum compotum
vnde dictus Dauid pecijt diem legalem desuper respondendum quj sibi conceditur per curiam
hodie ad octo et illo die tanquam peremptorie finietur et hoc cum consensu parcium

quidam Ranaldus famulus magistri cathan' adiudicatur in duobus amerciamentis in vno videlicet
pro perturbacione Nicholai liel et in alio pro perturbacione andree luss' et emendabit dampnum
Eodemmodo ijdem Andreas luss' et Nicholaus liel ipsorum quilibet in amerciamento pro perturbacione
prefati Ranaldi et emendabit eidem de dampno ad visum proborum

div.head: Nomina Juratorum ad Inquisicionem
div.p:
Johannes de marr' Matheus fichat Johannes de Knollis Dauid colison Thomas
de camera Andree alexander' rede Dauid mathoson Adam de crafurd Willelmus de
Kyntor Johannes Wormot alexander trail Dauid de Kyntor

head.foreign: Introitus Nauis Berwardi claisson de abhomine coram preposito et balliuis presenti die

div.p:
In primis xl quartaris of Inglis malt
Item lx quartaris of quhet and maschlach

The same day the personis sworne til ane assise before vritin be the consent and assent of
thomas scrogs on the ta part / and Marioune of scrogis on the tothir part / has endit
decretit and deliuerit that the said marion sal peissably brouke and ioys' for all the
dais of hir lif the half of the lang croft fra the guttar wp quhilk sche
broukit In Johne of scrogis the sonis tym / And the forsaid Thomas sal bruke and iois' the
Remainnand that the said Johne the son' broukit in his tyme / the quhilk til obserue
and kepe baith the partis forsaid ar sworne the gret aith in presence of the persons forsaid

Decimo quinto die Junij anno prescripto Andreas lammynton per confessionem propriam adiudicatur in amerciamento
curie pro iniusta percussione et perturbacione mariote sangstar et emendabit eedem de dampno
And it is ordanit be the Aldirman and consel that for the said strublance and striking that he sal
offer and gif ane candil of a li' of wax to the haly blude altar' and pay ij s' to
the said woman And gif that evir it be fundin that the said Androw committis ony sik offence
or strublance againnis ony person' of this burgh in his defaute he sal be
bannyst oute of this ton' for a yer' and day but fauour' / and this is ordand
becaus' of his perseuering of before in sik offence baith againnis the said voman
and vthiris and for this tym rychtsa

Curia legalis balliuorum burgi de Aberdene tenta per eosdem in pretorio xxjo die
Junij Anno Domini et cetera lxxiiio quo die sectis vocatis et curia affirmata absentes patent
in Rotulo sectarum

Eodem die Robertus quhitson tercio die legitime vocatus ad sectam Dauidis mathei
Non comparuit / Et ideo precipitur sergeando quod capiat districtum ab eodem ad valorem
amerciamenti regij / et quod premuniat eundem comparer' responsur' predicto Dauid ad proximam curiam
legalem tanquam ad quartum et diem peremptorium huius placiti sive processus

Quidam huntar' per assisam convictus de amerciamento curie pro iniusta perturbacione Willelmi modan
adiudicatur emendare parti lese et in amerciamento pro huiusmodi perturbio

Item eodem die omnes actiones mote inter Matheum cowpar ex vna parte et Dauid Kyntor ex
parte altera cum consensu parcium Respectuantur vsque hodie ad quindenam in eodem statu quo nunc
absque preiudicio alicuius partis
